game - package game
 
game - Variable in class game.GameLevel
 
Game - Class in game
The Game class manages the overall game flow, including starting the game, switching levels, and resetting or ending the game.
Game() - Constructor for class game.Game
Constructs the Game instance and opens the main menu.
GameLevel - Class in game
An abstract class representing a general game level.
GameLevel(Game, Score, Health) - Constructor for class game.GameLevel
Constructs a new GameLevel.
GameView - Class in game
The GameView class displays the game's graphical view, including the background, player, health bar, and score.
GameView(World, int, int, Player, Score, Health) - Constructor for class game.GameView
Constructs the GameView.
getBackgroundImage() - Method in class game.GameLevel
Returns the background image file path for the level.

Returns the background image for Level1.

getBackgroundImage() - Method in class game.Level3
Returns the background image for Level3.

Returns the current health value.
getHealth() - Method in class game.GameLevel
Gets the health tracker for this level.
getPlayer() - Method in class game.GameLevel
Gets the player character for this level.
getScore() - Method in class game.GameLevel
Gets the score tracker for this level.
getScore() - Method in class game.Score
Returns the current score.
getWorld() - Method in class game.GameLevel
Gets the world for this level.
goToNextLevel() - Method in class game.Game
Moves the game to the next level.
